actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To amend the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to authorize the imposition of rail safety user fees.

summary.text: Railroad User Fee Act of 1989 - Amends the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to require the Secretary of Transportation to establish a schedule of fees to be assessed to railroads to fund administrative costs of Federal railroad safety and noise control laws.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to authorize the imposition of rail safety user fees.
